title: Software Integration Engineer - CV/ML Algorithms, Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. The Vision Product Group (VPG) is responsible for key algorithms for Apple Vision Pro. Looking for Software Integration Engineers passionate about Augmented Reality.
description: The Vision Products Group (VPG) is looking for a skilled Software Integration Engineer to take new algorithms from prototype to production. Implement and integrate state-of-the-art algorithms for high-quality user experiences.
key_qualifications: 8+ years industry experience, strong proficiency in C/C++, scripting languages knowledge, experience with development tools, understanding of threads/processes, experience with cross-functional teams, mathematical foundation, hands-on experience with Git, Computer Vision/Computer Graphics background, experience with ML algorithms and Apple frameworks usage.
education_experience: B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or relevant industry experience with successful projects.
pay_benefits: Base pay range $175,800 - $312,200. Additionally, benefits include medical/dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, tuition reimbursement, discretionary bonuses/commission, and more.
